projects.title: BetSmarter
projects.overview: BetSmarter is a personal analytics companion designed to help sports bettors transform raw betting data into actionable insights. Built with React Native and Expo, the app provides a seamless cross-platform experience, empowering users to make smarter, data-driven decisions in the $140+ billion sports betting market.

keyFeatures.title: Comprehensive Dashboard
keyFeatures.description: The app features a centralized dashboard that displays open bets, recent results, and an overview of the user’s betting portfolio. This intuitive interface ensures users have immediate access to critical information at a glance.

keyFeatures.title: Advanced Analytics with Insights Page
keyFeatures.description: BetSmarter’s Insights page offers powerful tools to analyze betting patterns, including a Streak Detector, Bankroll Manager, and Bet Analysis System.

keyFeatures.title: Seamless Bet Recording
keyFeatures.description: The Bet Placing interface mimics the layout of popular sportsbooks, making it easy for users to input bets from any platform. Once recorded, BetSmarter automatically tracks, analyzes, and provides insights on every wager.

keyFeatures.title: Data-Driven Decision Making
keyFeatures.description: The Data page aggregates comprehensive statistics on bookmakers, teams, and players, sourced in real-time through integrated APIs. This feature ensures users can make informed decisions based on data rather than instinct.

keyFeatures.title: Personalized User Experience
keyFeatures.description: The Profile Page stores user preferences and settings, allowing the app to adapt to each user’s unique betting style.

technicalImplementation.title: Frontend
technicalImplementation.description: Developed using React Native and Expo for a smooth, cross-platform experience.

technicalImplementation.title: Backend
technicalImplementation.description: Utilized Supabase for efficient storage and management of betting and sports data.

technicalImplementation.title: APIs
technicalImplementation.description: Integrated real-time sports and betting data APIs to provide up-to-date statistics and insights.

technicalImplementation.title: Local Storage
technicalImplementation.description: Implemented local data storage to ensure user privacy and offline functionality.

projects.why: BetSmarter is more than just an app – it’s a tool designed to give bettors an edge in a competitive market. By combining intuitive design, advanced analytics, and real-time data, BetSmarter helps users understand their betting habits, refine their strategies, and ultimately make smarter decisions.

projects.title: BudJournal
projects.overview: BudJournal allows users to log their cannabis experiences, helping them find the perfect strain for their needs. Built with React and Firebase, it ensures a smooth and secure journaling experience.

keyFeatures.title: Strain Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Enables users to log and analyze their experiences with different cannabis strains.

technicalImplementation.title: Secure Data Storage

projects.why: BudJournal helps users make informed decisions about cannabis use by providing a personalized and data-driven journaling experience.
